replies.body:
If you're constantly seeing *"Attempting to Reconnect"*, it's an indication there may be something going wrong with your local network settings that prevent your client from keeping a stable connection to the servers. To resolve this, I recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) 

Let me know the results of those steps.
